name: LET ME IN (aleksi)
description:
You controll small energy ball that has beign seperated from its other half. The other half has formed a protective chell around it and does not let you near. Your mission is to get to your other half.

You move with arrows or w,a,s,d, or mouse.

The main idea was to make game where players only mission is to get to a certine point and to misguide player with the movement of the monsters. No killing or damaking, only pushing and pulling. 

This project was fun and teaching, even thought the playability is not what it should be :D. The idea still entiques me, and i might make properly moving monster later.

ps. first time animating :D :D :D 

CREDITS:
All made by me, Aleksi Höylä.
No stock material exept one google image of nebula.
